name: Disciplinary Devotee
text: Your careful study of mental magic grants you mastery in your discipline.
benefit: You gain a +1 bonus on caster level checks and concentration checks when casting spells from your psychic discipline, and you gain a +1 insight bonus on saving throws against spells from your discipline.
text_zh: 你熟练掌握了精神境界赋予的魔法。
prerequisites_zh: 精神境界（Psychic Discipline）职业能力。
benefit_zh: 当你施放通过精神境界（Psychic Discipline）获得的法术时，你的施法者等级检定以及专注检定均会获得+1加值；而且当你对抗这些法术时，你的豁免检定能够获得+1洞察加值。
